alert.note: Alert for Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Perry; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 7:15PM CDT until June 25 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PERRY...GRANT...NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON... NORTHEASTERN GARLAND...SALINE...NORTHEASTERN HOT SPRING AND SOUTH CENTRAL PULASKI COUNTIES... At 715 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Orion to near Tull to near Hot Springs Village, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... Pine Bluff... Benton... Bryant... Hot Springs Village... Sheridan... Southwest Little Rock... White Hall... Haskell... Shannon Hills... Redfield... Rockport... Traskwood... Tull... Prattsville... Poyen... Lonsdale... Otter Creek... Cane Creek... Ironton... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Perry; Pulaski; Saline
